text: N’abazapfa muri mwe bagasiga abagore, abo bagore bajye baguma mu ngo zabo amezi ane n’iminsi icumi. Nibarangiza igihe cyabo, nta cyaha kuri mwe (ababahagarariye) baramutse bagize ibyo bakora (nko gusohoka mu ngo, kwishyiraho imitako ndetse no gushakwa) mu buryo bwiza. Kandi Allah ni Uzi byimazeyo ibyo mukora
